text: Mili huuina marwaan tirton khan ama tampalooi kha aleitum. Khawa phakhan kani kha semthumma semkhat koijei, tha kha semthumma semkhat koijei, halli arsi ngaikha semthumma semkhat inkoijei, halli semthumma semkhat kawarsik inra-aang kha mangjei, khawa jarra suunna semthumma semkhat kawarsik kha warmakjei halli zaanna semthumma semkhat kawarsik kha-um warmakjei. Isa 13:10; Ezek 32:7
